messages.title: Your worst nightmare...
messages.content: The SNP would prop up Ed Miliband - meaning chaos for Britain

mentions.candidate: Paul Greenall is 48 years old and lives with his wife and 2 children in Westhead village. He works in the NHS and has been a local councillor for 14yrs.
mentions.tacticalSituation: This general election is too close to call, so YOUR vote will count in West Lancashire. In the last GENERAL ELECTION over 25,000 people in West Lancashire did not vote, thousands of them could have been Conservatives.

leaflet.personalStatement: Who do you want to be our next Prime Minister?

politicalExperience.achievements: Paul Greenall and other local Conservatives; working all year round, not just at election time
